mapper.insert: insert into ADMIN (AD_NO , AD_ID , AD_PW , AD_NAME , AD_DATE , AD_ACTIVE) values (CONCAT("AD", IFNULL((SELECT MAX(CAST(replace(AD_NO, "AD", "") AS unsigned))+1 FROM ADMIN A), 1)) , #{AD_ID} , #{AD_PW} , #{AD_NAME} , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , '1')
mapper.select: select CAST(REPLACE(AD_NO, "AD", "") AS UNSIGNED) "AD_NO" , AD_ID , AD_NAME , AD_ACTIVE from ADMIN ORDER BY AD_NO
select AD_ID from ADMIN where AD_ID = #{AD_ID}
select SEQ , CODE , HIDE from CODE where CO_TYPE = 'MM' ORDER BY SEQ
select CODE , HIDE from CODE where CO_TYPE = 'CA' ORDER BY SEQ
select MEM_NO , MEM_NICK , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_DATE from MEMBERS ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC
select PRO_NO , PRO_NAME , PRO_WR , PRO_DATE from PRODUCT where PRO_TC = '판매' ORDER BY PRO_NO DESC
